com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.monitoring.config

Class ScanConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.leantegra.wibeat.sdk.monitoring.config.ScanConfig

  • public class ScanConfig
extends Object
    Representation of the scan service configuration.
    Since:
    1.4.0

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int SCAN_MODE_BALANCED

      static int SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY
      Scan using the highest duty cycle.
      static int SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER
      Perform Bluetooth LE scan in the low power mode.

    • Field Detail

      • SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER

        public static final int SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER
        Perform Bluetooth LE scan in the low power mode.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SCAN_MODE_BALANCED

        public static final int SCAN_MODE_BALANCED
        Perform Bluetooth LE scan in the balanced power mode. Scan results are returned at a rate that provides a good trade-off between scan frequency and power consumption. This is the default scan mode.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY

        public static final int SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY
        Scan using the highest duty cycle. It's recommended to only use this mode when the application is running in the foreground.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

                                    int passivePeriod)

        Parameters:

        passivePeriod - The duration between scan
        See Also:

      • setScanMode

        public void setScanMode(int scanMode)
        Set scan mode for Bluetooth LE scan. For devices running on Android OS with version lower than Lollipop this parameter does not affect scan performance.
        Parameters:
        scanMode - The scan mode can be one of SCAN_MODE_LOW_POWER, SCAN_MODE_BALANCED or SCAN_MODE_LOW_LATENCY.

      • setBackgroundMode

        public void setBackgroundMode(boolean backgroundMode)
        Changes the scan service mode between foreground and background.
        Parameters:
        backgroundMode - Scan service mode

      • setLowPowerScanEnabled

        public void setLowPowerScanEnabled(boolean lowPowerScanEnabled)
        Set the enabled low power scan in passive period.
        Parameters:
        lowPowerScanEnabled - the low power scan value

      • isBackgroundMode

        public boolean isBackgroundMode()
        Returns whether the scan service is in the background mode.
        Returns:
        true if connection is successfully established with the scan service

      • isLowPowerScan

        public boolean isLowPowerScan()
        Returns whether the scan service use a low power scan in passive period.
        Returns:
        true if enabled low power scan
